en.purpose: To record a summary of health information about an individual, representing a subset of their health record at a specified point in time.
en.use:
Use as a generic containter to record a summary or overview of a patient's health and/or welfare status as a snapshot of their health at a specified point in time. 

The author of a health summary is usually a clinician who is familiar with the all of the relevant aspects of the individual's health that is the content of the summary.

The scope of a health summary can vary in different contexts, ranging from an overview of all key aspects of the individual's health and/or welfare to a summary of information focused on a limited aspect of the individual's health.

The intended readers of the health summary will vary according to the primary purpose and focus of the summary, and may include:
- any future healthcare providers;
- clinicians who have no personal knowledge of the individual but are required to provide healthcare, such as emergency treatment or when the individual is travelling;
- clinicians managing only specific aspects of the individual's health, such as diabetes or pregnancy; and
- the individual themselves.

The main Sections/Content component has been deliberately left unconstrained. This will allow it to be populated with any SECTION or ENTRY archetypes appropriate for the clinical purpose within a template. 

Even though clinical content is unconstrained, this archetype supports simple querying for all Health summaries that might be contained within a health record.
en.misuse: Not to be used to record details about a single clinical consultation, procedure, test or assessment etc.

at0000.1.description: Generic document containing a summary of health information about an individual.
A group of observations that are recorded at the same time and record the blood pressure, pulse, temperature and other readings.
동시에 기록되는 관찰사항들의 묶음으로 혈압, 맥박수, 체온과 기타 결과들을 기록한다.
Eine Gruppe von Observationen, die zur selben Zeit erfasst werden und den Blutdruck, Puls, Temperatur und andere Messungen beinhalten.
Grupo de observaciones registradas al mismo tiempo para distintos signos vitales (presión arterial, frecuencia cardíaca, temperatura, etc.)

at0001.1.description: Observaciones y medidas de signos vitales

at0001.2.description: Observaciones y medidas de signos vitales

at0001.3.description: Observaciones y medidas de signos vitales

at0000.1.description: De lichaamslengte wordt gemeten vanaf de kruin van het hoofd tot en met de voetzool. In het engelse taaldomein wordt er verschil gemaakt tussen hoogte (height) en lengte (length), waarbij hoogte staande gemeten wordt en lengte liggend.

at0004.1.description: De lichaamslengte vanaf de kruin van het hoofd tot en met de voetzool.

at0018.1.description: Opmerking over de meting van de lichaamslengte.

at0019.1.description: Vermeld ieder probleem of feit die de meting van de lengte beïnvloedt, b.v. notitie maken van een amputatie.

at0014.1.description: Positie tijdens de meting, van de gemeten persoon.

at0011.1.description: Beschrijving van het bij de meting gebruikte apparaat.

at0000.1.description: Height, or body length, is measured from crown of head to sole of foot.  Height is measured with the individual in a standing position and body length in a recumbent position.

at0004.1.description: The length of the body from crown of head to sole of foot.

at0018.1.description: Comment about the measurement of body height/length.

at0019.1.description: Record any issues or factors that may impact on the measurement of body height/length eg noting of amputation.

at0011.1.description: Description of the device used to measure height or body length.

at0000.1.description: Größe bzw. Körperlänge wird vom Scheitel bis zur Fußsohle gemessen. Größe wird in einer stehenden Position gemessen, Körperlänge in einer liegenden Position.

at0004.1.description: Die Länge des Körpers von Scheitel bis Sohle.

at0018.1.description: Kommentar über die Messung der Körpergröße/-länge.

at0019.1.description: Zur Dokumentation von Faktoren, die sich auf die Messung der Körpergröße/-länge auswirken können, z.B. einer Amputation.

at0014.1.description: Position des Individiums bei der Messung.

at0011.1.description: Beschreibung des Geräts, das zur Messung der Größe oder Länge verwendet wurde.

at0000.1.description:
Altura ou comprimento do corpo, é medida a partir da coroa da cabeça a sola do pé.
A altura é medida com o indivíduo na posição de pé e comprimento do corpo na posição decúbito dorsal.

at0004.1.description: O comprimento do corpo da coroa da cabeça a sola do pé.

at0018.1.description: Comentário sobre a medição da altura/comprimento do corpo.

at0019.1.description: Registrar quaisquer problemas ou fatores que possam ter impacto sobre a medição da altura/comprimento do corpo, por exemplo, observação de amputação.

at0011.1.description: Descrição do dispositivo utilizado para medir altura ou comprimento do corpo.

at0000.1.description: قد یا طول بدن از نوک سر تا کف پا اندازه گیری می شود.بلندی در حالت ایستاده و طول بدن فرد در حالت خوابیده اندازه گیری می شود

at0004.1.description: طول فرد از نوک سر تا کف پا

at0018.1.description: نظر در مورد اندازه گیری قد و یا طول فرد

at0019.1.description: ثبت هر گونه مساله یا فاکتوری که ممکن است روی اندازه گیری قد یا طول تاثیر داشته باشه به عنوان مثال ذکر قطع عضو

at0014.1.description: وضعیت فرد در حال اندازه گیری

at0011.1.description: توصیف تجهیز استفاده شده برای اندازه گیری قد یا طول فرد

at0000.1.description: الارتفاع أو طول الجسم, يتم قياسه من تاج الرأس إلى أخمص القدم. يتم قياس الارتفاع عندما يكون الفرد واقفا, و طول الجسم عندما يكون الفرد مستلقيا.

at0004.1.description: طول الجسم من تاج الرأس إلى أخمص القدم.

at0018.1.description: تعليق حول قياس طول / ارتفاع الجسم.

at0019.1.description: لتسجيل أي مسائل أو عوامل قد تؤثر على قياس طول / ارتفاع الجسم, مثل آثار البتر.

at0011.1.description: وصف الجهيزة المستخدمة لقياس طول أو ارتفاع الجسم.

at0000.1.description: La altura o longitud corporal es medida desde la coronilla de la cabeza hasta la planta de los pies. La altura es medida con el individuo en posición erguida y la longitud corporal, en posición recostada.

at0004.1.description: La longitud corporal desde la coronilla de la cabeza hasta la planta de los pies.

at0018.1.description: Comentario acerca de la medición de la altura/longitud corporal.

at0019.1.description: Registro de todos las aspectos, condiciones o factores que pueden afectar la medición de la altura/longitud corporal, por ejemplo la amputación de miembros inferiores.

at0014.1.description: Posición del individuo durante la medición de estatura.

at0011.1.description: Descripción del dispositivo usado para medir la altura o la longitud corporal.

at0000.1.description: Рост или длина тела. Измеряется от макушки до пяток, стоя, или в вытянутом положении.

at0004.1.description: Рост или длина тела. Измеряется от макушки до пяток, стоя, или в вытянутом положении.

at0019.1.description: Запишите все вопросы, или факторы, которые могут повлиять на измерения длины тела, например ампутации.

at0011.1.description: Описание устройства для измерения роста и длины тела.

at0000.1.description: 从头顶至脚底（足底）所测得的身高（高度）/身长（长度）。身高测量采用直立位，而身长测量则采用的是卧位（平卧位）。

at0004.1.description: 从头顶至脚底（足底）的身体高度或长度。

at0018.1.description: 关于身高/身长测量结果的注释、评论或意见。

at0019.1.description: 记录任何可能对身高/身长测量结果造成影响的事项或因素；比如，对于截肢情况的记录。

at0014.1.description: 测量身高/身长时受检对象的体位或者说身体姿势。

at0011.1.description: 关于用来测量身高/身长的装置的描述。

author.name: Jasmin Buck, Sebastian Garde
author.organisation: University of Heidelberg, Central Queensland University

at0000.1.description: *An instrument, apparatus, implant, material or similar, used in the provision of healthcare. In this context, a medical device includes a broad range of devices which act through a variety of physical, mechanical, thermal or similar means but specifically excludes devices which act through medicinal means such as pharmacological, metabolic or immunological methods.  The scope is inclusive of disposable devices as well as durable or persisting devices that require tracking, maintenance activities or regular calibration, recognising that each type of device has specific data recording requirements.(en)

at0001.1.description: *Identification of the medical device, preferably by a common name, a formal fully descriptive name or, if required, by class or category of device.(en)
at0001.1.comment:
*This data element will capture the term, phrase or category used in clinical practice. For example: <brand name><machine> (XYZ Audiometer); <size> <brand name> <intravenous catheter> (14G Jelco IV catheter); or <brand name/type> <implant>. With specific examples.

 Coding with a terminology is desirable, where possible, although this may be local and depending on local supplies available.
(en)

In this context, a medical device includes a broad range of devices which act through a variety of physical, mechanical, thermal or similar means but specifically excludes devices which act through medicinal means such as pharmacological, metabolic or immunological methods.  The scope is inclusive of disposable devices as well as durable or persisting devices that require tracking, maintenance activities or regular calibration, recognising that each type of device has specific data recording requirements.(en)

author.name: Alan March
author.organisation: Hospital Universitario Austral, Buenos Aires, Argentina

at0000.1.1.description: Archetype to record the actual use or consumption of a tobacco at the present time, a specific time or over a period of time.

at0012.0.1.description: Amount of substance consumed.  Data type can be further specified in specialised archetypes or in templates

at0012.1.1.description: Number of units containing tobacco consumed eg cigarettes or cigars

at0012.2.1.description: Weight of tobacco consumed eg in a pipe
